# Fit all derivative


```{r ,include=FALSE}
library(Rose)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(knitr)


df <- data.frame(x = 1:5, y = 1:5)
f1 <- function(df) {
  gg <- ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
    geom_point()
  assign("ggp", plotly::ggplotly(gg), envir = parent.frame())
  # ggp
  df # NOT returning a plot
}
res1 <- f1(df)
ggp # Let knit handle the plot
myplotly(ggplot())
masses <- c(
  1,
   27.30,
   11.70*27.30
)
```
